title: Release of registration
context: ยง560:7-106 Release of registration. Upon the termination and distribution of a registered trust, the trustee shall notify the court in which it is registered of such termination and distribution, whereupon the court may remove the record of the trust from its current registry of trusts. [L 1976, c 200, pt of ยง1] Rules of Court Release of trust registration, see HPR rule 128.
